item.title: Past and present : Indian Cricket
item.description: Those who know how cricket grew in India will agree that community pride was the major force behind the promotion of this game. Cricket had a very large following in India, even before independence. It had influenced Indian politics to a much larger extent than Indian historian have written about it. Cricket came to India with British who played it to amuse themselves in an alien land. An acute observer of British ways, Nirad Chaudhary, once remarked that to Englishman abroad, literature was his wife and sport his mistress.
